extended_tooltips.text:
Pacifies enemies for <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterHush_DebuffInitial.duration" style="Blue"/> second and reduces their attack damage and attack range by 50%.

When killed affected enemies will spawn a short-lived phantom that has <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterPhantom.vital_health.maximum" style="Bold"/> life and attacks for <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterPhantom_WeaponDamage.amount" style="Blue"/> damage every <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterPhantom_Weapon.period"/> seconds.

Resilient and Boss enemies are immune to the effect.

Pacifies enemies for <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterHush_DebuffInitial.duration" style="Blue"/> seconds and reduces their attack damage and attack range by 50%.

When killed affected enemies will spawn a short-lived phantom that has <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterPhantom.vital_health.maximum" style="Bold"/> life and attacks for <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterPhantom_WeaponDamage.amount" style="Blue"/> damage every <d ref="duckiesHeroCasterPhantom_Weapon.period"/> seconds.

Resilient and Boss enemies are immune to the effect.
